title: You Are My Hero
overview: Mi Ka, a new doctor in the hospital, meets Special Agent Shin Ke Lei during the exercise. At first, their relationship does not add up because of the initial misunderstanding, but they meet under different circumstances several more times and see each other in a new light. One day after the sudden earthquake, they go to the affected area to help with rescue operations, and Shin Ke Lei is touched by the dedication of Mi Ka. And then in one African country riots begin, because of what Mi Ka and colleagues is in a dangerous situation, but Shin Ke Lei, of course, will save them.Â
